example.eg: MPs are arriving in Westminster for the new session of Parliament.
example.egtrans: 议员们陆续到达威斯敏斯特，参加国会新会议。

example.eg: During the afternoon session, the group discussed the company's recruitment policy.
Dan and Glenn had a great session last night.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 饮酒作乐, 狂欢作乐

example.eg: Tomorrow children will be returning to school for the summer session.
The band is meeting at the recording studio for a session.

dsense.name: session
dsense.guideword: (period devoted to activity) (进行某一活动的)

example.eg: Sally is heading off for a session at the gym.
Members of the jury must not leave the building while the court is in session.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 会议中的, 庭审中的, 庭审中的

example.eg: I missed the jazz concert, but the  jam session was fun.
The kids played a marathon session of football in the park this morning.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 马拉松式的事情, 漫长的会议, 旷日持久的会议

example.eg: The presentation will be followed by a question-and-answer session.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 答疑大会, 答问会, 释疑会谈
